Explore

Welcome to hydeout

The one and only venue that offers countless entertaining, relaxing and amusing activities for each and every member of the family. Hyde Out is the place where you can play, shop, dine and entertain; or do nothing and enjoy the tranquillity of green open spaces that have been developed to create the escape you need from the chaos of the city.

Partners

Hyde Out is proud to host Cairo’s very best performance shows, events and vendors. To guarantee an unrivalled entertainment experience, we’ve partnered with Egypt’s most prominent and exclusive amusement and showbiz companies.

It's pet time!

Bring your Furry Friends and Double your Fun!

Find our pet park on the map

Hyde Out is a pet-friendly venue, which means there’s no reason to leave your furry friends at home when you’re out having a good time – they’re family after all! Bring your dog for a walk along the lake or enjoy a picnic and game of Frisbee in the park.

Working hours:

  • Thursday: from 10:00 to 23:00  
  • Friday - Saturday: from 9:30 to 23:00

For reservations please call direcctly K-9 SENSE on

+20 100 100 1000

www.k-9sense.com

You won’t shop till you drop but you’ll find everything you need!

You don’t need to go out of your way or call it a day early, because at Hyde Out you’ll find all your shopping needs in one place! Don’t forget to pass by Hyde Out’s designated shopping area, where you can shop at your own convenience and find everything you need for yourself, your kids and pets, and even the household.

Find fagnoon on the map
  • Picnic Store
  • Kids Store
  • Fashion & Accessories
  • Pet Store
  • Pharmacy
  • Supermarket
  • Convenience Store

Treat your mind, body and soul by exercising at Hyde Out’s Fitness Centre or in the outdoors to reconnect with nature. Explore the trails and paths of Hyde Out as you enjoy a quick jog in the park, or bring your exercise mat and meditate as you embrace the healing and relaxing sensations of the serene surrounding nature.

  • Back to main menu
  • Go to gallery

It’s play time!

Hyde Out’s Kids’ Park is the perfect place for the young ones to climb, run and tumble. Let them play and explore in an exciting and safe environment that’ll fill them with joy and nurture their basic skills. We encourage every member of the family to play, that’s why Hyde Out has designated play areas for adults, featuring a wide selection of challenging and adventurous games and activities.

Find fagnoon on the map

FAGNOON is a designated zone spread over 6000 sqm. In Hyde Out where convenient games are available like Paintball, Aqua Fight, Laser Fight, Bazooka Fight, and which are targeting young professionals, families and kids, university students and youth.

Working hours:

  • Sunday - Wednesday: from 14:00 to 21:00
  • Thursday: from 10:00 to 23:00
  • Friday - Saturday: from 9:30 to 23:00

Know More about Adrenalin Egypt

For reservations please call direcctly fagnoon on+20 100 100 1000

www.fagnoon.com

  • Go to gallery

Eat Al Fresco in the inspiring outdoors!

Picnics are an all-time favourite activity enjoyed by millions of people around the world. Today you can enjoy a most fascinating picnic experience in the heart of New Cairo, as Hyde Out’s Picnic Park opens its doors to introduce a new concept that celebrates get-togethers and special times with family and friends.

Overlooking the lake and surrounded by lush greenery, the Picnic Park is specifically designed to turn your picnic into a perfect day out with the family. Pack your picnic basket and mat, and bring along your family, friends and pets to enjoy a day out at Hyde Out’s Picnic Park.

Find our picnic park on the map

Al Fresco is a designated zone spread over 6000 sqm. In Hyde Out where convenient games are available like Paintball, Aqua Fight, Laser Fight, Bazooka Fight, and which are targeting young professionals, families and kids, university students and youth.

Working hours:

  • Sunday - Thursday: from 10:00 to 23:00  
  • Friday - Saturday: from 9:30 to 23:00

PICNIC PARK RULES AND REGULATIONS

Rejuvenate your Energyin the Heart of Nature!

Once you’re done with your fitness regimen, treat yourself to a nutritious meal or snack at Hyde Out’s designated health and fitness restaurant. If you’d rather grab a nutritious snack on the go, there are several healthy food options offered by the food trucks, food carts and juice bars at Hyde Out’s Park Food Area

FIND CROSSFIT STARS ON THE MAP

Explore the trails and paths of Hyde Out as you enjoy a quick jog in the park, or bring your exercise mat and meditate as you embrace the healing and relaxing sensations of the serene surrounding nature.

It’s Always Festive Time at Hyde Out!

At Hyde Out we take entertainment very seriously, and you’re always going to find something interesting happening on our premises. Every weekend and holiday we host exclusive events and performances for kids and adults alike. Make sure to check our events calendar and book your tickets in advance – they sell out fast!

FIND TICKETS MARCHE ON THE MAP
Back to main menu

TICKET’S MARCHE is a designated zone spread over 6000 sqm. In Hyde Out where convenient games are available like Paintball, Aqua Fight, Laser Fight, Bazooka Fight, and which are targeting young professionals, families and kids, university students and youth.

Working hours:

  • Sunday - Wednesday: from 14:00 to 21:00

The Promenade

The food park

Take a break and gratify your taste buds in the heart of nature!

Al Fresco is a designated zone spread over 6000 sqm. In Hyde Out where convenient games are available like Paintball, Aqua Fight, Laser Fight, Bazooka Fight, and which are targeting young professionals, families and kids, university students and youth.

  • Back to main menu
  • Go to gallery

THE PROMENADE

Hyde Out’s Promenade is the place to go to satisfy your every culinary desire. Lined with a wide selection of cafés and restaurants, the Promenade has something to offer for everyone, including healthy foods and snacks. The cafés and restaurants offer different tastes from local and international cuisines, with indoor and alfresco dining areas overlooking Hyde Out’s scenic landscapes and beautiful lake. FIND PROMENADE AREA ON THE MAP
